intro: Canna peruviana-purpurea, commonly known as the purple flame cannas, is a striking ornamental plant native to South America. It features large, vibrant leaves that range from deep green to purple, adding a bold visual impact to gardens. The plant produces showy, trumpet-shaped flowers in shades of red, orange, and yellow, which bloom in late summer. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and requires moist, well-drained soil. Canna peruviana-purpurea is often used in landscape design for its dramatic foliage and long-lasting floral display.
